Manifest.Name: Microsoft System Center Rule Templates Library

InputParameters.ScriptBody: ' Enter a script that outputs the required data to generate the event using a property bag ' Example VBScript that returns three properties: ' ' Dim oAPI, oBag ' Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") ' Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() ' Call oBag.AddValue("EventID",10) ' Call oBag.AddValue("EventParam1","SomeText") ' Call oBag.AddValue("EventParam2","SomeText") ' Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

' Enter a script that outputs a property bag with a performance value in it ' Example VBScript that returns a static value named "PerfValue": ' ' Dim oAPI, oBag ' Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") ' Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() ' Call oBag.AddValue("PerfValue",10) ' Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

DisplayString.Name: Alert Generating Rules
DisplayString.Description: This folder contains rule types that generate alert from various data sources

DisplayString.Name: Event Based
DisplayString.Description: This folder contains rule types that generate alert based on events

DisplayString.Name: Collection Rules
DisplayString.Description: This folder contains rule types that collect event and performance data from various data providers

DisplayString.Name: Event Based
DisplayString.Description: This folder contains rule types that collect event data from various data providers

DisplayString.Name: Performance Based
DisplayString.Description: This folder contains rule types that collect performance data from various data providers

DisplayString.Name: Probe Based
DisplayString.Description: This folder contains rule types that collect data from various data sources based on a probe

DisplayString.Name: Generic CSV Text Log (Alert)
DisplayString.Description: Alert on a log file entry from a generic text log file that uses a delimter character to separate different fields

DisplayString.Name: Generic CSV Text Log
DisplayString.Description: Collect log file entries from a generic text log file that uses a delimiter character to separate different fields

DisplayString.Name: Generic Text Log (Alert)
DisplayString.Description: Alert on a log file entry from a generic text log file

DisplayString.Name: Generic Text Log
DisplayString.Description: Collect log file entries that match a specificed expression from a generic text log file. You should use this rule type when log file entries have no delimiter to separate different fields.

DisplayString.Name: Script (Performance)
DisplayString.Description: Collect script data as performance data

DisplayString.Name: Syslog (Alert)
DisplayString.Description: Alert on syslog entries forwarded to the Windows computer that match a specified expression

DisplayString.Name: Syslog
DisplayString.Description: Collect syslog entries forwarded to the Windows computer that match a specified expression

DisplayString.Name: Execute a Command
DisplayString.Description: Run a command line task on recurring timed interval

DisplayString.Name: Execute a Script
DisplayString.Description: Run a script on recurring timed interval

DisplayString.Name: NT Event Log (Alert)
DisplayString.Description: Generate an alert in response to Windows events

DisplayString.Name: WMI Event (Alert)
DisplayString.Description: Alert on WMI events that match a specified WQL query

DisplayString.Name: WMI Event
DisplayString.Description: Collect WMI events that match a a WQL query
